backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Smart City Infrastructure Risk Dashboard backend, defining data types (Infrastructure, Prediction, BudgetEstimate, etc.), user profile management with access control, and risk scoring/prediction logic for infrastructure records.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades stored infrastructure records from the old schema (no photo) to the new schema by adding a null `photoBase64` field, and drops the `syntheticData` field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (useAnalyzeAndPredict hook, Add Infrastructure page, edit form photo upload) to their source files, components, and test requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-line descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and key changes in every component and page.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app that loads Leaflet and leaflet.heat via CDN script tags and mounts the React root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining all application routes (dashboard, map, budget, analytics, infrastructure detail, and the new `/add` route) wrapped in the shared Layout component.
frontend/src/components/AgeRiskScatterPl: Recharts scatter plot component that visualizes infrastructure age vs. risk score, with separate series for bridges and roads and a custom tooltip.
Reusable React component that animates a numeric value from zero to a target using requestAnimationFrame with an ease-out cubic curve.
Bar chart component that displays average health scores per city area, with a reference line for the overall average and color-coded bars for below/above average areas.
frontend/src/components/BudgetByRiskChar: Bar chart component that visualizes estimated maintenance budget split across low, moderate, and high risk categories with color-coded bars.
frontend/src/components/BudgetByTypeChar: Donut pie chart component that shows estimated maintenance budget distribution between bridges and roads based on infrastructure data.
frontend/src/components/BudgetOptimizati: Component that ranks the top 3 infrastructure structures by ROI index (risk reduction per dollar) and displays their estimated costs and risk details.
frontend/src/components/ConditionChart.t: Area chart component that projects a structure's condition rating over time (now, +5, +10, +20 years) with a critical threshold reference line.
frontend/src/components/FilterPanel.tsx: Sidebar filter panel with dropdowns for risk level, structure type, city area, and maintenance urgency, plus a reset button, using a shared FilterContext.
frontend/src/components/HealthDistributi: Bar chart histogram that buckets infrastructure structures into five health score ranges (0–100) with color-coded bars from red to green.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner component displaying animated summary stats (total structures, high-risk count, average health score), a refresh button, and a background image with gradient overlays.
frontend/src/components/InfrastructureCo: Renders a side-by-side comparison table for multiple infrastructure items, displaying metrics like risk score, health, material, condition ratings, predictions, and budget estimates fetched via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/InfrastructureEd: Provides a form for editing an existing infrastructure record, supporting photo upload with auto-triggered AI analysis to suggest structural condition ratings, and submitting updates via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/InfrastructureMa: Renders an interactive Leaflet map displaying infrastructure items as color-coded markers by risk level, with popups showing key metrics like risk score, health, and maintenance year.
frontend/src/components/InfrastructureTa: Displays a sortable table of infrastructure items with columns for name, type, area, age, risk score, risk level, health, and maintenance year, with navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app shell with a sticky top navigation bar, collapsible sidebar, and a filter panel, wrapping page content inside a FilterProvider context.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUpload.tsx: A drag-and-drop/click photo upload component that validates JPEG/PNG files under 5MB, converts them to base64, and displays a preview with replace/remove controls.
frontend/src/components/PredictionResult: Displays AI prediction results for an infrastructure structure, including risk score, health score, deterioration rate, maintenance year, and budget estimate, with a loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/components/PredictionSugges: Shows AI-suggested values (risk score, condition rating, deterioration rate, maintenance year, estimated cost) derived from a prediction result, with accept and dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/PriorityList.tsx: Renders a sorted list of infrastructure structures by risk score, showing estimated repair cost and recommended action, with navigation to each structure's detail page.
frontend/src/components/RiskBadge.tsx: A small presentational badge component that displays a color-coded risk level label (HIGH, MOD, LOW) in two sizes.
frontend/src/components/RiskGauge.tsx: A radial bar chart gauge that visually represents a 0–1 risk score as a percentage with a color-coded arc using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/SensorSimulation: A toggleable sensor simulation panel that displays live-updating condition rating, traffic load, risk score, and health score metrics when active.
frontend/src/components/SummaryStats.tsx: Displays a grid of animated summary statistics for a list of infrastructure items, including total count, high/moderate/low risk counts, and average health score.
frontend/src/contexts/FilterContext.tsx: Provides a React context for filtering infrastructure items by risk level, structure type, area, and urgency, with a `filterInfrastructure` function that applies all active filters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) access, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via `AuthClient`, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status through a React context provider and `useInternetIdentity` hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations including fetching, adding, updating, and deleting infrastructure records, as well as budget estimates and AI predictions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSensorSimulation.t: Hook that simulates live sensor data by periodically randomizing condition rating and traffic load, computing derived risk and health scores, with toggle and stop controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines light/dark CSS custom properties for a government intelligence-themed UI along with utility classes for glows, animations, and typography.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for extracting Motoko variant enum keys, formatting currency, risk levels, structure types, material types, urgency levels, and computing health scores from risk scores.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AddInfrastructure.tsx: Form page for adding new infrastructure records, supporting photo upload, AI-based analysis/prediction, and saving to the backend with navigation to the detail view on success.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Analytics page displaying charts for age vs. risk, area health scores, health score distribution, and side-by-side infrastructure comparison using data from all infrastructure records.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPlanning.tsx: Budget planning page showing city-wide maintenance cost estimates broken down by risk level and structure type, with a priority list and budget optimization tools.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying a hero section, summary statistics, and a filterable infrastructure table with refresh support.
Detail page for a single infrastructure record showing risk gauge, condition chart, sensor simulation, budget estimate, and an inline edit form.
frontend/src/pages/MapView.tsx: Map page rendering all filtered infrastructure assets on an interactive map with a risk-level legend and loading placeholder.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color palettes (navy, teal, amber), typography/mono fonts, border radius, box shadows, and animation keyframes for the dashboard theme.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the Smart City Infrastructure Risk Dashboard's architecture, tech stack, existing features, and requirements across the React frontend, Node.js backend, Python ML microservice, and PostgreSQL database.
